items.sentence: You should always wash your hands before eating.
Her voice could hardly be heard above the noise.
She got a slight burn on her hand while cooking.
Nobody noticed the picture was hung upside down.
I\'m certain that Tom will pass the examination.
I\'m glad that I was able to meet you yesterday.
I\'m going to Boston for a few days on business.
Tom and Mary don\'t like the same kind of music.
I was as surprised by Tom\'s arrest as you were.
I\'d like to spend a few moments with Tom alone.
